reviewDetails.comment: Dr Wilson is very caring and takes the time to listen to you. She does not rush appointments. She is very knowledgeable.

Excellent doctor who I've seen for 10+ years! Clear communication (explains every step of the exam, comfortable, checks in often, asks pointed questions) and very knowledgeable! Answered all of my questions and was very responsive on the patient portal. Highly recommended!
I felt very cared for and heard with Dr. Wilson!
She is diligent, caring and effective.  She takes time to explain what is taking place and is wonderful.
Dr. Wilson is very nice and professional. Her office is very pleasant to deal with.

I highly recommend Dr. Wilson.  She was very friendly, warm, patient, knowledgeable and asked lots of follow-up questions to get a more complete picture of my medical history as this was my first visit with her.  The staff was great -- very professional, attentive to each patient and seemed well trained in making  each patient's needs a priority.

I landed w Dr Wilson through default and so happy I did!
She is caring and really listens and takes time during the visit. 
I would highly recommend Dr. Wilson.
Dr Wilson has a very calming personality and always a professional demeanor.

reviewDetails.comment: Best doctor I have ever had in NY!   Cares deeply and does excellent work!    Highly recommend
Absolutely wonderful experience and very kind doctor. Made me feel at ease from start to finish

Dr. Hoffman is one of THE BEST medical professionals I have ever had the pleasure of knowing.  I am SO FORTUNATE to have had all of my necessary surgeries over the past 25 years with Dr. Hoffman.  Dr. Hoffman is very kind and caring and explains every thing so well.   I would not have had any quality of life, and I would have lived with so much more suffering if it was not for the talent of Dr. Hoffman's surgery experience.

reviewDetails.comment: Very knowledgeable and experienced.  My two kids have been with her for 10 yrs now.

Dr. Natale is an amazing pediatrician. We have been with her since day 1 with our kids.  She is knowledgeable and kind.  She gives honest opinions and puts new parents at ease.  Our kids are a bit older now and she speaks to them as a person and not as a child, which gives them a sense of self.  I would highly recommend Dr. Natale to anyone.  We love her.
Very thorough and efficient service.
The best!
She is very professional and kind
Good bedside manners

reviewDetails.comment: She is a very kind and caring person, also very knowledgeable. You are lucky to have her

Dr. Gannon has wonderful bedside manner and reviews medical history to access what is needed and what isn't. That said, she is very thorough and talks patients through what she is doing and how she is doing it. I am extremely impressed and would absolutely recommend her.
Dr. Gannon is a very attentive, thorough and caring provider. I've been her patient for over 10 years and have always been happy with the level of care she provides.
She is wonderful. Dr. Gannon is friendly and easy to talk to!

reviewDetails.comment: Great Dr.
Dr. Bhatt is a caring knowledgeable professional

Besides being a highly knowledgeable Doctor, Dr. Bhatt is very caring, kind and compassionate person. He takes his time to listen and explain me in detail my health care needs. He positively inspires me to take care of myself.
Listen a very well, extremely intelligent and very kind and caring. Exceptional physician.
Terrific doctor all around.  He takes a very practical approach to my long term care.
Absolutely the best. Caring, practical, responsive and knowledgeable. Have been his patient for about 20 years. Highly recommend!

I highly recommend Dr. Bhatt..
Dr. Bhatt Always runs on time and when I get in the room he doesn't rush me out. He listens to my issues and explains what needs to be done and what meds if any I should be taking.

reviewDetails.comment: I have been to Dr. Scinto twice.  He is very relatable and thorough.   I’m glad I found him.
Dr. Scinto is a great listener, takes your whole history, and provides individualized custom care. He is an expert in his field and is very personable. Highly recommend.

he took his time for my diagnosis
he didn't rush
I am confident he is correct
Let's see how the new meds work
No quick fix for me
Very nice DR.  -  easy to talk to & understand

reviewDetails.comment: Great doctor.

I find Dr. Ornstein to be conscientious and thoughtful. He asks lots of questions and listens to my answers. 
He then suggests a plan of action and always provides me with a written summary of everything determined and discussed during my visit. I appreciate that.
Very knowledgeable and down to earth.
Very thorough and listened to my concerns
Professional and courteous
He is very thorough.

reviewDetails.comment: The opthalmology team at Jefferson Valley is excellent. This was my first visit and the thorough pre-exam done by his associate made me feel confident about my exam being comprehensive. The people were friendly and patient as they worked with me.
Yes, I strongly recommend Dr. Garcia when he was in New York City. Unfortunately, he is being reassigned to Westchester.  I wish him the best and Westchester is very lucky.
Dr. Garcia is very thoughtful and considerate. He patient in answering all my  questions.
Dr. Garcia noted my history without me telling him.  He explained issues to me clearly, and answered my questions fully.  I appreciated his demeanor and patience.
Dr. Garcia seems knowledgeable, professional, competent and pleasant.

participatingProducts.description: Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus
Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus with CareLink

reviewDetails.comment: Dr So has been my primary care doctor for close to 15 years, she is always compassionate and kind. She listens when I speak and trusts that I know my body and when I am sick.

Dr. So is knowledgeable.  She stays to schedule appointment times, but takes time to speak with and understand patients needs.
Optum however, has been a nightmare.  Whenever I have even the simplest call, I am on hold for 30 minutes.
Dr. So has been my PCP for 18 years now and she is very thorough and caring.
Amazing doctor!!!
Caremount is way out of control with their charges.  I love the doctor but they are too expensive.

Dr. So has been my doctor for many years. She is always professional and caring. She spends time and wants to know how I am and how my family is as well. When I have an issue, she makes room for me in her schedule. I would like to compliment her nurse Donna as well. Donna has a lot of patience and is always willing to help me with a concern or question over the phone.
On time caring professional service
She is great

schools.name: New York Univ Sch Of Med

reviewDetails.comment:
I have known doctor Devito for over 20 years. Both my husband and I see him. 
He is very thorough and will explain in detail any procedures and medications prescribed. He makes you feel at ease and is professional and trust he will always follow up. I would recommend Dr. Devito to all my family and friends looking for an internist.
An amazing doctor that takes the time to speak to you and answer any question you may have at any time.

He is a great doctor; knows plenty; great bed-side manners; very thorough; takes the entire hour to talk to you, answer any questions, review notes from prior visits with respect to ailments, issues, etc. I would recommend this doctor.
Dr. Devito is a great doctor - thorough, knowledgeable, great at communicating important and relevant medical information, efficient. A treasure.

I am grateful that Dr Devito was willing to schedule a last minute video consultation (within a couple of hours of calling his office) when I tested positive for covid.  His advice and timeliness of setting up the video consultation were very much appreciated!
I have been Dr. Devito’s patient for more than 10 years and he is thorough, friendly, and well-informed. I would recommend him to anyone and everyone.
Dr. Devito is thorough and caring.  He listens thoroughly and makes good recommendations.
Dr. Devito is very thorough and takes time to discuss all relevant health topics and explains everything very well. Also appointment was on time.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Cho has been a considerate, caring, and efficient PCP who provided quick responses to questions and referrals. I would recommend Dr Cho highly

I've been seeing Dr. Cho for years now.  She is competent, caring, and patient.  She never dismisses my thoughts (even though they may sometimes border on hypochondria!) and takes my concerns seriously without overindulging them.  I couldn't ask for more in a doctor!
Dr. Cho has been my doctor for about 5 years now, and I trust her completely. Highly recommended!
She was helpful and caring.  Since my symptoms had subsided, she showed me photos to help confirm the diagnosis, which was very reassuring.
Took time to listen to my concerns and followed up timely.
Dr Cho is so kind and smart.  Best doctor I've every had!
Always very thorough
